text: is a Japanese tennis player. On 24 February 2020, Muramatsu achieved a career- high singles ranking of world No. 205. On 2 April 2018, she peaked at No. 303 in the doubles rankings. Muramatsu has won one singles title and two doubles titles on the ITF Circuit. She made her WTA Tour main-draw debut at the 2018 Japan Women's Open after receiving a wildcard for the women's doubles tournament, partnering Hiroko Kuwata. ==Performance timelines== ===Singles===
